sentences.en: "Beauty is only skin deep," my mother would say.
sentences.cn: “美是肤浅的。”妈妈会说。

sentences.en: A boutique and beauty salon are conveniently located within the grounds.
sentences.cn: 时装店和美容院就在区内，非常方便。

sentences.en: an area of outstanding natural beauty
sentences.cn: 一个自然风景极美的地区

sentences.en: Beauty is an attitude. It has nothing to do with age.
sentences.cn: 美是一种态度，与年龄无关。

sentences.en: Gregory was still enchanted with Shannon's youth and joy and beauty.
sentences.cn: 格雷戈里仍为香农的朝气、快乐和美丽着迷。

sentences.en: her beauty and grace
sentences.cn: 她的美貌和优雅风姿

sentences.en: In time you'll appreciate the beauty and subtlety of this language.
sentences.cn: 总有一天你会体会到这门语言的优美和微妙之处。

sentences.en: Kathryn was no beauty at the best of times.
sentences.cn: 凯瑟琳即使是在她正当韶华时也绝非美女。

sentences.en: Mainline feminism was arguing for the inherent beauty of the natural woman.
sentences.cn: 主流女权主义思想倡导女性天生的自然美。

sentences.en: Millions of dollars are spent each year on beauty products .
sentences.cn: 每年都有上千万的钱花在美容产品上。

sentences.en: Millions of dollars are spent each year on beauty products.
sentences.cn: 每年都有上千万的钱花在美容产品上。

sentences.en: She has just had her legs waxed at the local beauty parlour.
sentences.cn: 她刚在当地一家美容院除了腿毛。

sentences.en: She looks terrible, shorn of all her beauty and dignity.
sentences.cn: 失去了美貌和尊严，她看上去糟透了。

sentences.en: She was considered a great beauty in her youth.
sentences.cn: 她年轻时被视为大美人。

sentences.en: The happiest are not those who own all the best things, but those who can appreciate the beauty of life.
sentences.cn: 最幸福的人们并不一定什么都是最好，只是他们懂得欣赏生活的美好。

sentences.en: The leggy beauty was none other than our own Naomi Campbell.
sentences.cn: 这位长腿美女不是别人，正是咱们的娜奥米·坎贝尔。

sentences.en: The pass was a real beauty, but the shot was poor.
sentences.cn: 传得非常漂亮，但是临门一脚太臭了。

sentences.en: The room's style exemplifies Conran's ideal of "beauty and practicality".
sentences.cn: 那个房间的风格是体现康兰“美观和实用”观念的典范。

sentences.en: This juxtaposition of brutal reality and lyrical beauty runs through Park's stories.
sentences.cn: 这种残忍的现实和浪漫美好事物的并存始终贯穿于帕克的短篇小说中。

sentences.en: You should have seen the boat – a real beauty.
sentences.cn: 你应该一早看看那艘船——棒极了。

sentences.en: You'll be impressed with the brightness and the beauty of the colors.
sentences.cn: 色彩的明艳美丽会让你大饱眼福。

phrases.tran_cn: 月月红（美国产四季开花的红蔷薇）

phrases.phrase: beauty is in the eye of the beholder

phrases.tran_cn: (谚)美貌不过一张皮（喻不可以貌取人）
选美大赛王后，第一美女
n. 午夜前之睡眠；小睡

trans.tran_cn: 美（丽），美人，美好的东西，典型的例子，优点
trans.tran_en: a quality that people, places, or things have that makes them very attractive to look at
